solution_line_template: Vinnie has written a total of {words_saturday} words on Saturday + {words_sunday} words on Sunday = <<{words_saturday}+{words_sunday}={total_words_written}>>{total_words_written} words.
He has therefore exceeded the limit by {total_words_written} written words - {word_limit} word limit = <<{total_words_written}-{word_limit}={words_exceeded}>>{words_exceeded} words.
